Topic.Title: Mike Rayfield

Message.Msg: His departure has been rumored for years, even back then Charlie D used it to fear monger Tegra.. This is definitely NOT A SURPRISE to Nvidia, at all.

Topic.Title: Firmware maker says it could enable dual-boot Windows RT, Android devices

Message.Msg: name one dual boot that was a commercial successful. Those things never went anywhere. The only consistent dual boots that I have seen people use are geeks booting to linux for their work and then dual booting to windows for gaming. And those are far and few in between. dual boot windows and android - total non event.

Message.Title: How could u compare windows rt with nexus 7, its more like ipad!
Message.Msg: With its superior design, with keyboard and office, buying one means I could save money by not buying another notebook. Hence paying $500 to $700 on a surface is worth it! $400-$500 cheap $600-$700 fair. Only fools use article commenting that tablet has to be cheap to fight iPad. I have an iPad and love it. But Surface opens up another whole new segment of market. Untested one. But based on its unique keyboard and most importantly Microsoft share price, my bet is that its a success!

Topic.Title: How could u compare windows rt with nexus 7, its more like ipad!

Message.Msg: 'paid basher'? I seriously doubt it. 'paid pumpers' - that I can very much believe. On the more serious side, I have no doubt that is what Ballmer is being fed with by all the yes-men he must have around him. To pick the right strategy, he will have to rise above all that noise. I have zero confidence that he can do that. If in the next month, Asus and Lenovo fade away, that's a good sign. If Asus and Lenovo make noises, winRT is DOA.

Topic.Title: Firmware maker says it could enable dual-boot Windows RT, Android devices

Message.Msg: IOS/Windows - I run it every day. It's a huge success, short sighted one. It's not about creating a new untapped commercial market, it's about being able to run favored apps or fill in holes on one platform or the other. Ask VMWare if they have a business or not.

Topic.Title: Firmware maker says it could enable dual-boot Windows RT, Android devices

Message.Msg: "VMware is hardly about dual-booting" really? shall we see what VMWare says about that? "Many users install VMware Workstation on a dual-boot or multiple-boot computer so they can run one or more of the existing operating systems in a virtual machine." You can google it too! Maybe you should consider that simple but amazing search tool before inserting foot in mouth again?

Topic.Title: Firmware maker says it could enable dual-boot Windows RT, Android devices

Message.Msg: just like I said, VMWare is about virtual machines and not about dual-booting. If Asus/Lenovo starting making noise about winRT in the next weeks, I thinkT nvda will make a great short. Either they warn on Q3 or they will tank Q4 forecast - you seriously think the forecast factored in is not about Tegra? Either one will make for a deep drop.

Topic.Title: Rayfield depart known by hedge funds, baked in!!

Message.Msg: It is funny that when Rayfield was heading up the mobile business division, shorts thought he was doing a lousy job.....and now that he has left, the same folks claimed it is a big loss for nVIDIA. Since when you are considered to incur a big loss when you lose a "liability"?
